columns.Publication_ID: A unique identifier for each publication record.
columns.Book_ID: A reference identifier linking to the associated book.
columns.Publisher: The name of the publisher responsible for the publication.
columns.Publication_Date: The date when the publication was released.
columns.Price: The retail price of the publication.

publication.table_description: The publication table stores details about various publications, including unique identifiers, associated books, publishers, publication dates, and pricing information.

columns.Book_ID: A unique identifier for each book in the table.
columns.Title: The title of the book, which represents its name.
columns.Issues: The number of issues or editions available for the book.
columns.Writer: The name of the author who wrote the book.

book.table_description: The book table serves as a catalog of books, detailing their unique identifiers, titles, available issues, and corresponding writers.
